description: Detects the creation or update of a scheduled task to run with "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" privileges
name: Schtasks Creation Or Modification With SYSTEM Privileges
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/change\ * OR *\ \/create\ *) AND process.command_line.text:*\/ru\ * AND process.command_line.text:(*NT\ AUT* OR *\ SYSTEM\ *)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.parent.executable.text:*TeamViewer_.exe* AND process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/TN\ TVInstallRestore*)))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
